channel.title: Alerts Feed
channel.description: Alerts Feeds -- Los Angeles Fire Department

item.description: KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1121; 03:02PM; 2332 N Lincoln Park Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3PiDeTL; #LincolnHeights; It took 36 firefighters 23 minutes to extinguish the attic fire in a residential home. Thankfully, there were no reported injuries. Cause under investigation.; FS 1; Batt 2; Central Bureau; Council District 14; BC2 E1 E16 E201 E203 E212 E47 EA1 RA4 RA47 SO1 SQ21 T1 T12 T3; CH7; 12 14; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire; INC#1121; 02:39PM; 2332 N Lincoln Park Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3PiDeTL; #LincolnHeights; Single-family home with smoke showing. Offensive mode.; FS 1; Batt 2; Central Bureau; Council District 14; BC2 E1 E16 E201 E203 E212 E47 RA4 RA47 SQ21 T1 T12 T3; CH9; 12; Nicholas Prange

title.a: Update Major Emergency Structure Fire 08/30/2023 INC#0282

item.description: Update Major Emergency Structure Fire; INC#0282; 09:30AM; 1131 S Los Angeles St; MAP: https://bit.ly/44wQWXL; #DowntownLA; The building shares walls on either side with other businesses in a row of commercials. Firefighters have successfully protected the occupancies on either side, containing the blaze to the unit-of-origin. The heavy load of textiles (clothes/fabrics) still contain deep seated hot spots, which will flare up as the debris is pulled apart within the building, which sustained a roof collapse and walls buckling. This will be an extended operation that will rely heavily on LAFD Heavy Equipment Operators to strategically disassemble the rubble, while hose lines are standing by.; FS 10; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 14; AR1 AR10 AR11 AR21 AR39 AR7 BC1 BC11 BC5 CM20 CM21 CM22 E10 E11 E14 E17 E20 E202 E203 E209 E21 E210 E211 E215 E226 E227 E229 E261 E266 E285 E3 E37 E5 E85 E9 E95 EA1 EM1 HE1 HR3 PI4 RA10 RA27 RA810 RA827 RA85 RA9 RS3 SO1 SQ21 T10 T11 T15 T2 T26 T27 T29 T3 T61 T66 T85 T9 UR27 UR85 UR88; CH7; 13 14; Nicholas Prange

Auto Rollover; INC#0404; 07:54AM; 10300 W Wentworth St; MAP: https://bit.ly/45uD8yh; #ShadowHills; Firefighters responded to a solo vehicle that went over the side and down an embankment (approximately 40 feet down). Crews rescued two patients using a basket off of the aerial ladder to bring them up to street level, where ambulances were waiting. A mother and daughter (9 years old) were both transported in moderate condition. Nothing further.; FS 24; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 7; BC12 E274 E474 RA74 RA89 RA98 T74; CH8; 17; Nicholas Prange

title.a: Update Major Emergency Structure Fire 08/30/2023 INC#0282

item.description: Update Major Emergency Structure Fire; INC#0282; 07:00AM; 1131 S Los Angeles St; MAP: https://bit.ly/44wQWXL; #DowntownLA; As firefighters continue to battle in defensive mode (from the exterior only) with master streams (ladder pipes, portable monitors, and large-diameter hand lines), the building is beginning to show signs of compromise, as walls begin to buckle. This appears to be a building full of textiles, providing a heavy fire load inside. MEDIA: PIO Captain Adam Van Gerpen is on scene.; FS 10; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 14; AR1 AR10 AR11 AR21 BC1 BC11 BC5 CM20 CM21 CM22 E10 E11 E14 E17 E20 E202 E203 E209 E21 E210 E211 E215 E226 E227 E229 E3 E5 E9 EA1 EM1 HE1 HR3 RA10 RA27 RA810 RA827 RA9 RS3 SO1 SQ21 T10 T11 T15 T2 T26 T27 T29 T3 T9 UR27 UR88; CH9; 13 14; Nicholas Prange

title.a: Update Major Emergency Structure Fire 08/30/2023 INC#0282

item.description: Update Major Emergency Structure Fire; INC#0282; 06:30AM; 1131 S Los Angeles St; MAP: https://bit.ly/44wQWXL; #DowntownLA; Heavy flames are now coming through the roof. The Incident Commander has withdrawn companies and transitioned to defensive mode (exterior-only fire attack). Approximately 120 firefighters are assigned to this incident.; FS 10; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 14; AR1 BC1 BC11 BC5 CM20 CM22 E10 E11 E14 E17 E20 E203 E209 E21 E210 E211 E215 E226 E227 E229 E3 E5 E9 EA1 EM1 HR3 RA10 RA27 RA810 RA827 SO1 SQ21 T10 T11 T15 T26 T27 T29 T3 T9 UR27 UR88; CH9; 13 14; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire; INC#0282; 05:50AM; 1131 S Los Angeles St; MAP: https://bit.ly/44wQWXL; #DowntownLA; Two-story commercial with heavy smoke showing. Offensive mode.; FS 10; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 14; BC1 BC11 BC5 CM20 CM22 E10 E11 E14 E17 E203 E209 E210 E211 E215 E227 E3 E5 EA1 EM1 HR3 RA10 RA27 RA810 RA827 SO1 SQ21 T10 T11 T15 T27 T3 UR27 UR88; CH9; 13 14; Nicholas Prange

KNOCKDOWN Brush Fire; INC#1481; 06:15PM; EB 210 Fwy x Maclay St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3q8R7rK; #Sylmar; It took just 18 minutes for crews from LAFD and ANF to extinguish a half-acre brush fire near the Maclay on ramp to the 210 freeway. No reported injuries. Cause was unable to be determined.; FS 91; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 7; AO1 AO2 BC10 BC12 BC15 CM40 CM42 CW3A E18 E275 E287 E298 E7 E8 E87 E90 E91 EM15 H4 H7 HA4 HA7 RA81 T75 T87 T98 WT77; CH8; 17; Nicholas Prange

Brush Fire; INC#1481; 05:57PM; EB 210 Fwy x Maclay St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3q8R7rK; #Sylmar; Half-acre brush fire near the freeway. No structures threatened.; FS 91; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 7; BC10 BC12 BC15 CM40 CM42 E18 E275 E287 E298 E7 E8 E87 E90 E91 EM15 H4 H7 HA4 HA7 RA81 T75 T87 T98; CH5; 17; Nicholas Prange

KNOCKDOWN Brush Fire; INC#1145; 03:46PM; 3050 N Lake Hollywood Dr; MAP: https://bit.ly/3PrPpy1; #HollywoodHills; Firefighters responded to a two-vehicle traffic collision, which appears to have caused the initial brush fire. Firefighters extinguished the quarter-acre fire in medium brush, before locating another spot fire (50' x 50') approximately 100 yards away from the original fire. Crews transitioned to the second burn and surrounded that one, achieving extinguishment of both in a total of 53 minutes. One adult female was assessed for minor injuries due to the traffic collision, but did not need hospital transport.; FS 76; Batt 5; West Bureau; Council District 4; AO1 AO2 BC14 BC5 CW3A DZ45 E227 E260 E41 E76 E82 E86 E90 E97 EM5 H3 H4 H7 HA3 HA4 HA7 HE1 RA827 T27 T60; CH5; 13; Nicholas Prange
